attributes.action: ignore the petition submitted by Lina Drimas that calls for the Prime Minister to ignore the petition on animal testing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite there being (a) modern and more effective methods like computer models and tissue research and (b) that 92% of drugs tested on animals are still found to be inappropriate for humans, animal testing is still a very important part of medical research.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
